content: Weiran Wang | Computer Science - College of Liberal Arts and Sciences | The University of Iowa Skip to main content Weiran Wang, Ph.D. Assistant Professor Biography Weiran Wang is an Assistant Professor in Computer Science at the University of Iowa. He was most recently a Staff Research Scientist at Google. He was a Senior Research Scientist at Salesforce Research from 2019 to 2020, and a Senior Applied Scientist at Amazon Alexa from 2017 to 2019. He spent 2014 to 2017 as a postdoc researcher at Toyota Technological Institute at Chicago, after obtaining his PhD at University of California at Merced in 2013. Research InterestsHis research interests lie in machine learning, speech processing, and optimization.Research Interests (Keywords)Machine Learning; Speech Processing; Artificial IntelligenceSelected PublicationsContextual Biasing with the Knuth-Morris-Pratt Matching Algorithm.
